TopicTitle: in editors; can't drop parts on unlocked parts

Articles.Content:
In the VAB/SPH if you have parts that are not purchased yet, but you've unlocked the tech-tree node for then they show up as recessed icons. If you are holding a part that you want to get rid off you can drop it anywhere on the part list, except on one of the un-purchased parts. If you try to drop it on them then nothing happens.

It's only mildly annoying, but I thought I should mention it. Has this been reported so far? I couldn't see mention of it anywhere.
Since I normally play without the requirement to purchase parts, I've never seen this before... this is on a totally stock install?

Since I normally play without the requirement to purchase parts, I've never seen this before... this is on a totally stock install?

yeah, I just double checked with a fresh stock install of 0.90.0 in a new career (on moderate, just with a load of starting sci so I could unlock some nodes to test this); issue remains.

I really like the feature/option of not having all the parts available just from unlocking a tech-tree node and then being able to purchase just the ones I need from inside the editor. This issue of not being able to drop parts on locked parts is the only glitch with it!
